Tairāwhiti waka ama sprint stalwart in it for lifehttps://www.nzherald.co.nz/gisborne-herald/sport/tairawhiti-waka-ama-sprint-stalwart-in-it-for-life/MGCC5VC7QZHFZANPJWGMUMH5CE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/gisborne-herald/sport/tairawhiti-waka-ama-sprint-stalwart-in-it-for-life/MGCC5VC7QZHFZANPJWGMUMH5CE/ Chris TaewaRaipoia Brightwell one of special group to have competed at all Waka Ama Sprint Nationals Mon, 23 Dec 2024 04:00:00 +0000 Waka NZ Hall of Fame inductee Raipoia Brightwell, of Gisborne, has competed at all 35 sprint nationals on Lake Karapiro and has no intention of stopping. "There's no age in waka ama," she says. Photo / Waka Ama NZ
